content.p:
ยง 574. Mechanicville urban renewal agency. A municipal urban renewal
agency, to be known as the Mechanicville urban renewal agency, is hereby
established for the accomplishment of any or all of the purposes
specified in articles fifteen and fifteen-A of this chapter and in
accordance with article eighteen of the constitution of the state of New
York. It shall constitute a body corporate and politic, be perpetual in
duration and consist of three members, the mayor, commissioner of public
safety and the commissioner of public finance. It shall have the powers
and duties now or hereafter conferred by article fifteen-A of this
chapter upon municipal renewal agencies. It shall be organized in the
manner prescribed by and be subject to the provisions of article
fifteen-A of this chapter and the agency, its members, officers and
employees and its operations and activities shall in all respects be
governed by the provisions of such article.
